Posts.Content: Jul 29, 2017 12:51AM bmercer wrote: I went on Monday and received stickers and marks. Go back on the 31st to start radiation. Was told to not use soap to keep the stickers in place. I live in Florida and the heat is unbearable, I have lost 3 of the stickers so far. Worried that their going to be upset, but I've done the best I could.
Posts.Title: Starting Radiation August 2017 Legomaster225 2017sanam
